alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Transylvania (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 15 at 5:34AM EST until December 16 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a Flood Advisory for the French Broad River At Blantyre affecting Henderson and Transylvania Counties... ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...French Broad River At Blantyre. * WHEN...From early this morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Action Stage. Most farm fields are flooding between the French Broad River and Brevard Rd. and between the French Broad River and Pleasant Grove Rd. In addition, flooding of low-lying areas along the Little River is expected, especially near Cascade Lake Road and Merrill Lane. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest between 15 and 16 feet later today. - Action stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. For detailed information including observed and forecast stages, flood impacts, flood history, FEMA Flood Hazard Layers, and more, please visit: https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp
